senses.sense_definition: Possessing the distinct qualities, atmosphere, or identity of a specific location; rich in a sense of place.

examples.text: The architect tried to create a <w>placeful</w> design that respected the history of the local area.
Critics praised the novel for its <w>placeful</w> descriptions that made the setting feel like a character.

senses.sense_definition: The amount or number of people or things that fill a particular space.

examples.text: We invited a whole <w>placeful</w> of guests to celebrate the opening.
The manager had to deal with a <w>placeful</w> of angry customers when the system failed.
